content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=5.5, y=0.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=5.5, y=0.5), offshore pump(position x=-7.5, y=25.5), and pipes connecting them.

### Furnace group at position(x=52.0, y=-84.0 to y=-80.0)
Consists of following entities
- Furnace(position x=52.0, y=-84.0) 
- Furnace(position x=52.0, y=-82.0) 
- Furnace(position x=52.0, y=-80.0) 

### Furnace at position(x=62.0, y=-54.0)
Consists of a furnace at position(x=62.0, y=-54.0)

### Lab at unknown position
Consists of a lab with no power.

### Pipe group with fluid system 21270
Consists of pipes at multiple positions including (x=-0.5, y=-2.5), (x=0.5, y=-2.5), (x=1.5, y=-2.5), and others.

### Electricity group with id 1271
Consists of small-electric-poles at positions (x=3.5, y=0.5) and (x=7.5, y=-0.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Electricity generator not connected to power network
- Ensure the steam engine is connected to a power network before attempting to use it.
### Errors when inserting items into entities
- Ensure the entity can accept the item being inserted and has available space.
### Errors when using incorrect prototype
- Ensure the correct prototype is used when inserting items into entities.
### No input liquid in steam engine
- Ensure the steam engine has an input liquid before attempting to use it.
### No fluid present in connections
- Ensure the offshore pump and steam engine are connected to pipes with fluid before attempting to use them.
### No ingredients to smelt in furnace
- Ensure the furnace has ingredients to smelt before attempting to use it.
### Furnace fuel source is full
- Ensure the furnace fuel source is not full before attempting to add more fuel.
### Entity not accepting items
- Ensure the entity can accept the items being inserted and has available space.
